text: Joseph 'Joe' Dawson is a retired English boxer. ==Boxing career== Dawson was twice National Champion in 1978 and 1979 after winning the prestigious ABA featherweight title, boxing out of Boston ABC. He represented England in the -48 kg light-flyweight division, at the 1978 Commonwealth Games in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada. ==References== Category:Living people Category:British male boxers Category:Boxers at the 1978 Commonwealth Games Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Featherweight boxers Category:Light-flyweight boxers
title: Joe Dawson (boxer)
